short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture and save selected text with a stylish note-taking interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChromeCanvass is a powerful and visually captivating note-taking extension for Chrome. Effortlessly capture and organize your thoughts, ideas, and snippets of information with a sleek, modern interface. Unleash your creativity and productivity with customizable notes, intuitive sharing options, and seamless integration across devices.
